long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You've heard of Dark Mode, well introducing Plaid Mode.  Transform your browsing experience to Plaid with a single click! This lightweight Chrome extension lets you toggle a stylish plaid background on any webpage, bringing a personalized touch to your internet journey. Perfect for users looking to customize their visual experience with minimal effort. Simple, secure, and fun! Make the Internet go Plaid.  It's ludicrous!  It's Plaid!
